author: djy
title: 青年跨国服务力 元智大学桃市青年局推国际志工计划
text:
【大纪元2025年06月12日讯】（大纪元记者徐乃义台湾桃园报导）元智大学12日与桃园市政府青年事务局共同启动“2025年国际志工计划”，元智大学作为主要合作伙伴，将持续深化与青年局的合作，组织“泰北团”与“大马团”志工队，带领学生前往泰国与马来西亚参与海外服务行动，展现青年在国际场域的行动力与影响力。
启动记者会正式宣告“桃青国际志工队”成立，元智大学作为首波参与单位之一，发挥学术与教育资源优势，持续推动具深度与影响力的国际志工行动。学务长刘俞志表示，透过国际志工计划，学生不仅能回应在地需求，更能在服务过程中实践跨文化沟通、国际理解与自我成长，是课堂之外最珍贵的学习历程。
“桃青国际志工队”招募对象涵盖设籍、就学或就业于桃园市、年龄在18至45岁的青年，打破以往仅限学校或民间团体主导的框架，开放青年以个人身份参与。经过甄选后，入选者将于今年夏季赴泰国及马来西亚执行志工任务，并可获得青年局每人新台币3万元的奖励金支持。
元智大学今年延续多年国际志工经验，积极参与青年局的整合计划。除学生组团参与，亦有校内师长担任指导老师，协助学生规划课程内容、文化融入策略与服务对象沟通模式，强化服务品质与教育意涵。
青年局长侯佳龄指出，“桃青国际志工队”的成立，是桃园青年跨足国际的重要里程碑。市府很高兴能与元智大学等单位携手合作，期盼透过这样的平台，让更多优秀青年将热情化为行动，在国际舞台上发光发热。
计划中，元智学生将投入资讯教育、语言教学、文化交流、永续议题与影像纪录等多元领域，发挥各自专长，并透过团队合作回应当地需求。
透过本次合作，元智大学再次展现高等教育在推动青年公共参与与国际连结上的关键角色。未来也将持续深化与政府部门及国际社群的合作，培养具备全球视野与实践能力的青年人才，拓展台湾青年于世界舞台上的影响力。◇
责任编辑：昌英

author: Società Editrice Athesis S.p.A.
title: Ig Metall minaccia sciopero, 'Volkswagen ha superato i limiti' | G. di Vicenza
text: MILANO, 30 NOV - Il sindacato metalmeccanico tedesco Ig Metall annuncia una possibile tornata di scioperi a partire da lunedì, primo giorno utile dalla data di scadenza della tregua con Volkswagen, prevista alla mezzanotte di oggi. Per il colosso tedesco di Wolfsburg sarebbe la prima grande protesta dal 2018. Le proteste potrebbero essere di alcune ore o di un'intera giornata, mentre il prossimo incontro del sindacato con l'azienda è fissato per il prossimo 9 dicembre. La possibile protesta segue il nulla di fatto nel negoziato tra l'azienda e il sindacato, che aveva proposto un taglio dei bonus per il management in risposta alla richiesta del gruppo di una riduzione del 10% degli stipendi per oltre 1/3 dei 300mila dipendenti in Germania, tagliando anche i benefit aziendali. A fine ottobre il colosso di Wolfsburg, alle prese con le difficoltà del mercato dell'auto per la concorrenza delle vetture elettriche importate dalla Cina, aveva proposto di chiudere almeno 3 fabbriche sulle 10 attive in Germania, licenziando migliaia di lavoratori e riducendo del 10% il salario a quelli rimasti. In una nota diffusa nella vigilia Volkswagen ha definito 'non sufficienti' le proposte dei sindacati per raggiungere l'obiettivo di tagliare i costi per 1,5 miliardi di euro. Il gruppo afferma comunque di "mantenere il dialogo aperto" con i rappresentanti dei lavoratori per raggiungere "soluzioni percorribili". Ig Metall, dal canto suo, ha definito "estremamente deplorevole" il fatto che il gruppo abbia respinto le "proposte costruttive" che erano state avanzate. Secondo Ig Metall Volkswagen "si è spinta oltre i limiti di quello che i lavoratori possono accettare"..

author: GetFeatured
title: Iconic Custom Home Builders: Crafting Dreams, Building Legacies in Spring, TX | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
Spring, TX - In the expansive home construction market, finding a trusted contractor can be daunting. Navigating through a multitude of options can often add complexity to the search as individuals strive to strike a balance between service quality, punctuality, and affordability. Luckily for residents in and around Spring, TX, Iconic Custom Home Builders emerges as a reliable solution.
Boasting over a decade of industry presence, this regional powerhouse consistently delivers on three key client priorities - service quality, unwavering punctuality, and cost-effectiveness. This company's track record speaks volumes, positioning it as a dependable choice among many contractors.
Iconic Custom Home Builders has solidified its standing as the premier Spring custom home builder offering homes, pools, additions, and commercial construction solutions through its comprehensive services. The company offers tailored solutions from ground-up projects to renovations, additions, and extensions.
Beyond construction, the custom home builder near me in Spring Texas , excels in diverse installations, such as spa and pool setups, intricate railing systems, and unique features like bowling alleys and indoor basketball courts. This versatility ensures that Iconic Custom Home Builders not only constructs homes but transforms them into personalized and exceptional living spaces that cater to the varied needs and desires of their clientele.
The company’s commitment to bringing each client's vision to life is evident in its time-tested and collaborative approach. Beginning with meticulous project analysis, the company's contractors work closely with clients, ensuring every detail aligns with their aspirations.
Thorough planning sets the stage for flawless execution, where the team's expertise shines. From inception to completion, clients are involved at every step, culminating in a comprehensive final walk-through and seamless handover.
Iconic Custom Home Builders distinguishes itself further through its commitment to competitive and transparent pricing, eliminating the uncertainty of surprise charges. Upholding a policy of utmost transparency, the company ensures that clients are provided with comprehensive and clear pricing structures right from the project's inception.
Their dedication to fair and competitive rates extends throughout the process, guaranteeing no unexpected or hidden costs. By prioritizing honesty and integrity in their pricing, Iconic Custom Home Builders reaffirms its dedication to delivering not only exceptional quality but also peace of mind to their valued clients in Spring, TX.
For property owners looking for ideas for their next project, Iconic Custom Home Builders offers an easy-to-navigate online gallery. This collection features completed projects, giving a firsthand look at the company's work. Prospective clients can explore the gallery to get inspiration, see the company's skills, and imagine the possibilities for their own spaces.
About Iconic Custom Home Builders: With over a decade of dedicated service in Spring, TX, Iconic Custom Home Builders stands as the cornerstone of bespoke home construction and top-tier service. Its expertise spans from ground-up builds to intricate renovations, additions, and extensions, consistently turning clients' dreams into reality. Known for transparent pricing and a collaborative approach, the company's technicians set the standard for excellence in crafting exceptional homes.

author: MarketScreener
title: Sudan's RSF paramilitaries welcome UN call for cessation of hostilities in Ramadan - 09/03/2024
text:
CAIRO (Reuters) - Sudan's Rapid Support Forces (RSF) paramilitary group on Saturday welcomed a call by the United Nations Security Council for a cessation of hostilities in the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, offering a potential respite from the 11-month-old conflict.
Ramadan is expected to start on Sunday evening.
In a statement, the RSF expressed hope that the Security Council resolution would "significantly lessen the suffering of the Sudanese people by ensuring the smooth delivery of humanitarian aid" and pave the way for a political process leading to a permanent ceasefire.
War erupted in Sudan on April 15, 2023, between the Sudanese army and the RSF. The U.N. says nearly 25 million people - half Sudan's population - need aid, some 8 million have fled their homes and hunger is rising. Washington says the warring parties have committed war crimes.
On Friday, the Security Council adopted a British-drafted resolution for a cessation of hostilities in Ramadan with 14 votes in favour, while Russia abstained. However, the mechanism for implementing the resolution remains unclear.
Sudan's U.N. ambassador, Al-Harith Idriss Al-Harith Mohamed, told the council on Thursday that the president of the country's transitional council commended the appeal of U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres for a Ramadan truce. However, he said the leader is "wondering about how to do this."
"In embracing the proposed humanitarian ceasefire, we express our readiness to partake in discussions concerning the establishment of mutually agreed upon monitoring mechanisms," the RSF said in its Saturday statement.
"These mechanisms are crucial for ensuring the effective implementation of the ceasefire and for achieving the humanitarian objectives intended by this resolution."
(Reporting by Hatem Maher and Ahmed Tolba; Editing by Andrew Heavens and Giles Elgood)
Share © Reuters - 2024

author: listillo
title: #36 Expedientada la dueña de una VPO en Ibiza por alquilar habitaciones a turistas en AirBnb
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#1](c1#c-1) Esto es sarcasmo?
Le damos VPO a personas con el impuesto de todos para que hagan negocio con ello?
Eso es lo que estas diciendo ? Que te parece bien?
la anfitriona se presentaba como una "superhost", se podían leer más de 15 evaluaciones de usuarios, tenía calendario de disponibilidad y se podía reservar con un precio de 180 euros la noche, con 15 euros de gasto por limpieza y 64 euros de comisión de servicio a Airbnb.
ha destacado que este caso es "especialmente ofensivo" porque, en una situación de necesidad de un domicilio para tantas personas, "hay quien se aprovecha del beneficio de haber obtenido una VPO para hacer negocio ilegal.
Porque hay gente que defiende las ilegalidades cuando es incluso pagado con los impuestos de todos? Porque se diluye mejor? Porque duele menos si pagamos entre todos?
Una persona con una VPO y que puede hacer 5400 euros al mes
[#4](c4#c-4) Yo lo que no entiendo es con lo fácil que es ver donde se ofertan los pisos no se actúe de oficio contra ellos. Es que nunca ha estado tan fácil...
[#23](c23#c-23) en Ibiza los mismos que tienen que perseguir esto están en el ajo, son las familias de los políticos y amiguetes las que más se lucran de exprimir el mercado inmobiliario. Sólo actúan contra casos flagrantes como este, y para que parezca que hacen algo.
[#1](c1#c-1) La ha comprado, otra cosa es que la multen. Es propietaria de una vivienda, no la tiene alquilada y luego la realquila.
[#10](c10#c-10) normalmente las vpos tiene unas condiciones estrictas,por lo menos en mi comunidad.Si quieres alquilarla o venderla debes hacerlo a un precio tasado (o jugártela y cobrar el resto que pides en B).Y supongo que tampoco la puedes lanzar al mercado como puso turístico .de ahí el expediente...bien abierto en mi opinión
y no hay multa a Airbnb por no asegurarse que el piso era de VPO y no se podia usar para estos fines? Yo me he encontrado con mas de un caso de VPO donde se saltan la legalidad portales como Idealista, alquilerseguro y wolo. La ultima vez ya estaba hasta las narices capture fotos y deje denuncia en la administracion para que inspeccionaran. Todos deberiamos denunciar a la minima
Cuantos habrá como esta mujer. Lo que tienen que hacer es auditar todas las viviendas turísticas y aflorar el negocio B. El que lo tenga ilegal, denuncia, devolucion de lo defraudado más intereses de demora más los gastos de la administración en investigar su delito. Y de paso meto el apartamento en una lista negra para hacer una visita sorpresa dos veces al año, para ver si ha aprendido la lección.
[#17](c17#c-17) Hace años a una pareja de amigos, muy hippies ellos, les dieron una VPO (a él si no recuerdo mal), pero es que la zona no les gustaba porque....era así una zona...con gente...un poco...diversa...vamos a decir. Así que la alquilaron en B y todos tan contentos, al poco se compraron un piso en una zona piji.
Una puta vergüenza.
[#27](c27#c-27) Antes no entendía lo de la cultura del pelotazo en España y se me abrieron los ojos con el novio de Ayuso (es solo un ejemplo). Creo que hay gente que hace una apuesta a corto plazo, y se la juega defraudando al fisco. Si le sale bien, pelotazo que te crió, mete unos cuantos cientos de miles de euros en el banco en relativamente poco tiempo, coge el ascensor social y sube de categoría. Si te pillan, te tocará liquidar con hacienda, y si es muy muy gordo, tal vez cárcel, que hasta 24 meses sin antecedentes ni lo pisas. Es decir tienes una oportunidad. En el caso peor, te quedas como estabas y te tocará vivir una vida normal.
En los anuncios, la anfitriona se presentaba como una "superhost", se podían leer más de 15 evaluaciones de usuarios, tenía calendario de disponibilidad y se podía reservar con un precio de 180 euros la noche, con 15 euros de gasto por limpieza y 64 euros de comisión de servicio a Airbnb.
Solo era cuestión de tiempo que la cacharan...
[#11](c11#c-11) joder 180 + 15 + 64 sin duda tambien tenian que expedientar a airbnb por lucrarse de algo ilicito.

author: @wion
title: Pope Francis washes and kisses feet of female prisoners in ritual ahead of Easter - World News
text: Pope Francis, on wheelchair, washes and kisses feet of female prisoners in ritual ahead of Easter Story highlights This ritual commemorates Jesus' act of humility towards his apostles during the Last Supper on the night before his crucifixion Pope Francis, sitting in his wheelchair, washed and kissed the feet of 12 women prisoners as part of a traditional ritual ahead of Easter on Thursday (Mar 28). To perform the ritual the pontiff travelled to Rome's Rebibbia prison which is located in a run-down area on Rome's outskirts. There, he presided over a Holy Thursday Mass for dozens of inmates, guards, chaplains, and officials gathered in an outdoor area of the female section. The ritual According to Reuters, this ritual commemorates Jesus' act of humility towards his apostles during the Last Supper on the night before his crucifixion. The ritual called Pedelavium or Pedilavium is followed by various Christian denominations. However, Francis is the first pope to hold the ceremony outside churches. He also happens to be the first pope to include women, atheists, Muslims, and other non-Christians in the service. Before him, the previous pope used to hold the service in either St. Peter's Basilica in the Vatican or the Basilica of St John in Lateran, including only men, usually priests. However, as per Reuters, in continuation of a practice he began when he was archbishop of Buenos Aires, Pope Francis typically holds the ceremony in prisons, homes for the elderly or hospices. Pope's health The pope, on a wheelchair due to poor health, washed and kissed the right feet of 12 women sitting on a riser. As per reports, many of the prisoners were foreigners and some of them were moved to tears by the gesture. Also read | [Pope Francis undergoes medical evaluation in Rome hospital amid lingering battle with flu](https://www.wionews.com/world/pope-francis-skips-weekly-audience-citing-lingering-cold-symptoms-694790) The 87-year-old's health has been a concern recently. The pontiff, who recently limited his peaking engagements due to fatigue related to bouts of bronchitis and influenza, seemed fit during the washing of feet ceremony. "Each of you has their own story, but the Lord listens to us with open arms and never tires of forgiving," he said, improvising his homily (sermon) around the theme of service to others. (With inputs from agencies)
